author: eluchsinger
body:
I've just tried to install PS Core 7.0.1.0 with the MSIX x64 installer. 

The installer says the installation with App-Installer is not supported, because "some constrained functions are being used".

I'm using Windows 10 Pro Insider Preview (Version 2004, Build 19624.1000).

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/12324017/82026011-69a47a80-9692-11ea-961d-407381db1405.png)

comments.author: Witchilich
comments.body: yeah I have the same issue.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: Could you please check with latest 7.1.0 Preview?

comments.author: Witchilich
comments.body: When will this come to the Store ?

comments.author: eluchsinger
comments.body: Then I'll close this issue. It probably should be documented somewhere tbh.

title: MSIX not working for 7.0.1.0
